election_record.label: New York 1804 Governor

sub_unit.name: Albany
sub_unit.note: Morgan Lewis received 1 vote as Mokin Lewis.

sub_unit.name: Ticonderoga
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY), The Albany Register (Albany, NY) and American Citizen (New York, NY) list 41 votes for Morgan Lewis.

sub_unit.name: Manheim
sub_unit.note: The American Citizen (New York, NY) and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) list 76 votes for Morgan Lewis.

sub_unit.name: Rensselaer
sub_unit.note: Morgan Lewis received 1 vote as Megan Lewis.
Aaron Burr received 1 vote as Asau Burr.

sub_unit.name: Petersburgh
sub_unit.note: The Troy Gazette (Troy, NY) lists 196 votes for Morgan Lewis.

sub_unit.name: Stephentown
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) lists 197 votes for Morgan Lewis.

sub_unit.name: Washington
sub_unit.note: Morgan Lewis received 1 vote as Lewis Morgen.

sub_unit.name: Middle
sub_unit.note: The American Citizen (New York, NY) lists 5298 votes for Aaron Burr.

sub_unit.name: Chatham
sub_unit.note: The Bee (Hudson, NY), the Balance and The Albany Register (Albany, NY) list 151 votes for Aaron Burr.

sub_unit.name: Rockland
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 60 votes for Aaron Burr.

sub_unit.name: Clarkstown
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) lists no votes for Aaron Burr.

sub_unit.name: Hempstead
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) lists 144 votes and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) lists 156 votes for Morgan Lewis.

sub_unit.name: Orangetown
sub_unit.note: The Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) lists 126 votes for Morgan Lewis.

sub_unit.name: New York
sub_unit.note: The American Citizen (New York, NY) lists New York county's returns as Westchester county's returns.

sub_unit.name: Richmond
sub_unit.note: The American Citizen (New York, NY) lists Richmond county's returns as New York county's returns.

sub_unit.name: Westchester
sub_unit.note: The American Citizen (New York, NY) lists the votes from Westchester county as Richmond county's returns.
Aaron Burr received 1 vote as Col. Burr.

sub_unit.name: Dryden
sub_unit.note: "The number of votes given in Dryden is not written at length in the transcript as required by law; the return is made in figures." The Albany Register (Albany, NY). June 16, 1804.

sub_unit.name: Chenango
sub_unit.note: The Western Oracle, and Chenango Weekly Magazine (Sherburne, NY) lists 1534 votes for Morgan Lewis and 1279 votes for Aaron Burr.

sub_unit.name: Sherburne
sub_unit.note: The Western Oracle, and Chenango Weekly Magazine (Sherburne, NY) lists 145 votes for Morgan Lewis.

sub_unit.name: Genesee
sub_unit.note: In 1802, Genesee county was formed from part Ontario county, but the two continued to vote together in 1804, and most newspapers list returns from both counties together.

sub_unit.name: Northampton
sub_unit.note: The Ontario Repository lists 52 votes for Aaron Burr.

sub_unit.name: Herkimer
sub_unit.note: Morgan Lewis received 1 vote as Lewis Morgan.

sub_unit.name: Schuyler
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 145 votes for Morgan Lewis.

sub_unit.name: Oneida
sub_unit.note: Morgan Lewis received 1 vote as Moran Lewis.
John Lansing received 3 votes as John Lansing, Jr.
The Patriot, The Albany Register (Albany, NY) and Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) list 1860 votes for Aaron Burr.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 1758 votes for Aaron Burr.

sub_unit.name: Whitestown
sub_unit.note: The Patriot and the Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY) list 278 votes for Aaron Burr.

sub_unit.name: Onondaga
sub_unit.note: John Lansing received 1 vote as John Lansing, Jr.

sub_unit.name: Ontario
sub_unit.note: In 1802, Genesee county was formed from part Ontario county, but the two continued to vote together in 1804, and most newspapers list returns from both counties together.
Morgan Lewis received 1 vote as Martin Lewis.

sub_unit.name: Bloomfield
sub_unit.note: The Ontario Repository lists 59 votes for Morgan Lewis.

sub_unit.name: Canandaigua
sub_unit.note: The Ontario Repository lists 54 votes for Morgan Lewis.

sub_unit.name: Phelps
sub_unit.note: The Ontario Freeman (Canandaigua, NY) lists 18 votes for Aaron Burr.

election_record.reference: Original Election Books. Dutchess County Historian, Poughkeepsie.
Original Election Books. Steuben County Court House, Bath.
The Daily Advertiser (New York, NY). April 30, 1804.
New-York Evening Post (New York, NY). April 30, 1804.
The Balance, and Columbian Repository (Hudson, NY). May 1, 1804.
The True American and Commercial Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA). May 2, 1804.
Poughkeepsie Journal, and Constitutional Republican (Poughkeepsie, NY). May 8, 1804.
The Western Oracle, and Chenango Weekly Magazine (Sherburne, NY). May 24, 1804.
